title: 'Modernisation' would ruin Anglesey's lighthouse. The people are right to fight it
text:
Lighthouses? Who needs them? What place does a beam of light from an old stone tower have in a modern world of sophisticated navigational aids run by satellites? There are certainly those who argue that lighthouses have outlived their usefulness and should be de-commissioned – or, at the very least, “modernised”.

But, as the people of Anglesey have gloriously shown us, there are still plenty who are willing to fight for their lighthouses.
